law.catch_line: Vacancy in office of clerk -- Appointment of successor.
law.text: Whenever a vacancy occurs in the office of the clerk, the chief judge of the judicial circuit shall within thirty (30) days appoint a qualified successor to the office who shall serve until replaced as provided by Section 152 of the Constitution.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 15, effective January 2, 1978.
